dataHome.subtitle: Web Developer | Visual Design
dataHome.description: I'm Creative designer based in Brasil, and i'm very passionate and dedicated to my work

sobre.title: About Me
sobre.subtitle: My Presentation
sobre.descricao: Frontend developer in the city of São Paulo, I create web pages with UI/UX user interface, I am currently studying Systems Analysis and Development - IFSP, seeking to improve both my “soft skills” and “hard skills”.

translation.__comment-Projects: Past Skills - Projectsitem.jsx e Data.jsx - Projects Obs: Poderias usar o ID mas estou saudno o title deles para facilitar a leitura

ingressoja.title: Ticket
ingressoja.description: Event website where users can choose a movie, play, or lecture of their preference - IFSP in 2023.

ComenteSobre.title: CommentAbout
ComenteSobre.description: Web system that allows users to comment on specific topics similar to a forum - IFSP in 2023.

BusinessIA-PI.title: BusinessIA-PI
BusinessIA-PI.description: Objective is to create a specialized website to meet the needs of Business.IA, Artificial Intelligence and Data Analysis, aligned with Marketing Strategies - IFSP in 2023.

Ativa Investimentos.title: Activate Investments
Ativa Investimentos.description: Used Vue.js and CSS to enhance my skills, developing a clone of the Ativa Investimentos company page for study purposes - in 2023.

Calendário SUS.title: SUS Calendar
Calendário SUS.description: Project challenge was to develop a calendar to assist patients through SUS with an online schedule - Senac in 2022.

Redes Sociais.title: Social media
Redes Sociais.description: Social media portfolio before the existence of tools like Linktree and ChatGPT, filling a gap that these tools currently occupy - Senac in 2022.

Currículo Web.title: Web CV
Currículo Web.description: I developed my first comprehensive project to consolidate my knowledge acquired so far in 2022 - Senac.
